name: Barista Buzz
description:
A slaving barista has to last as many gruelling shifts as she possibly can by serving coffee to run-down "zombie" hipsters.

Getting them their morning fix. 

Open Fire!

Some bearded hipsters come in with a CRAVING for coffee.
They cannot function without it...but then again, who can?
Satisfy the needs of these fatigued customers or risk having them ambush you
